TileMutatorDef.label: no wind
TileMutatorDef.description: Winds are virtually absent in this region.

TileMutatorDef.label: geomagnetic storm
TileMutatorDef.description: An intense geomagnetic event blankets the region, completely disabling all electrical devices.

TileMutatorDef.label: skygazing spot
TileMutatorDef.description: A serene atmospheric phenomenon encourages colonists to spend more time gazing at the sky. Increases the chance of skygazing and boosts the joy it provides.

TileMutatorDef.label: tornado alley
TileMutatorDef.description: Frequent and intense tornadoes sweep through this region, threatening the colony.

TileMutatorDef.label: sandstorms
TileMutatorDef.description: Sandstorms are much more frequent in this area.

TileMutatorDef.label: rotten stench
TileMutatorDef.description: Acrid vapors seep from the ground, blanketing the area in a foul smell that burns the lungs and sours the mood.
